评论详情: This vest is a slim fit. I've seen reviews telling you to get a size bigger, don't unless you're a  big guy. Just understand that slim fit is exactly that. I wanted a tailored, well fitted vest and that's just what this is. Regarding the fabric, it's nice, a good weight to it, and the craftsmanship is good.  The styling is also very good and works as casual or formal. I have another black vest that feels kind of fragile compared to this. This feels good to wear. At this price you would be had pressed to find a better deal. This is my new "Go to" vest, I'm very happy with it.

评论概述: great way to upscale a suit
评论详情: this vest is well made the material is quality and the back material gives it an upscale look . the buckel in the back straps is solid .I'm short but the size fit perfectly and the color match was perfect for my suit .It comes with a faux pocket square sewen in the top pocket I wish wasn't there but it looks ok.The lower pockets had some stiches in the cutting them in half but came out easily .I will definitely be ordering more in different colors

评论概述: Great vest but only goes up to XL
评论详情: We purchased this vest for my sons wedding.  He is 6'2" and broad shouldered and a big boy.  We bought this vest and it is an exceptional quality vest at a great price.  I only gave it a 4 star because it is a little short in the front and they only go up to size XL..  With the population of larger people I wish they offered it in larger sizes.  I ended up ordering a different vest  made for bigger men but I really did like this one the best.  It's such a great looking vest I actually kept it so my husband could use it.  This vest was too small for my son but it is a sharp looking vest and with exceptional quality material..  My husband is 5'11" and 215 lb and this vest fits him perfectly.  The only reason for the 4 star rating is because I wish they made it in larger sizes...
Nice look and fit! I ordered a 3X when I usually go with a 2X. I did order a size a bigger because it's a slim fit. It worked out well and I'm satisfied with the purchase. I ordered the Black one.
Nice quality, soft, ran a little big but looks nice.
Second vest received, fits fine and is smart and economical for the high-end bartending position
Love it. Very nice and classy. I normally wear mediums. However, the way these are made/cut, the medium was too small, so had to replace it with the large.
Fits well
Sizes run small according to size chart so order at least next size up. Timely delivery and suited my purpose well

评论概述: Looked nice, but did not last one day's wear
评论详情: The vest looked very nice and fit my partner very well. It was perfect in looks and cut. However, only a few hours of him wearing it passed, and one side of the cinch strap on the back unraveled and came detached from the vest. This resulted in tearing of the other side, since both straps were hanging from a single side, connected by the buckle. The look of the vest is good; the quality of its construction leaves something to be desired.
I liked the color of this vest may be used elegantly or casual, was very well packaged material of good quality. Would highly recommend to purchase this vest. Fast delivery!!
Nice quality true to size color as stated
Really good fabric and looks fancy.
The color is exactly like the photo, quality of fabric is there, and just overall worth it imo

Looks great and is very comfortable. Because I have a fairly feminine body shape I had to pin it in the back for videos/photos so it looked right on me (it was a little wide in places) but that’s not the fault of the vest.  I will say one of the straps in the back that are used to fit it/tighten it easily tore right out of its seam. I can sew though and just pinned it temporarily for these photos so it isn't a problem for me personally.
After 2 replacements,  this one was perfect and arrived in time for homecoming on the 18th!!
This is well built, runs a little on the smaller side hate the pockets aren’t real but wasn’t a dealbreaker it was ordered for a 1 time occasion

评论概述: Looks Great - Order One Size Larger - Bought For My Own Funeral
评论详情: I bought a black vest, but I returned it due to a small, production snag (also a little too tight - "Slim Fit"). The vendor allowed a free return, so I swapped it for another - also got a larger size = one size up from normal - it's "Slim Fit" and my fit is no longer "slim."Nice material .  I purchased it to keep in a box labeled "Final [my] Funeral Clothes." I hope whoever finds me/goes through my stuff will ensure I'm dressed in this vest when my pine box is lowered into my grave at the historic Oak Grove Cemetery in Nacogdoches, TX.  I intentionally selected/bought/was given, Plot #13 in the new addition of that cemetery.  Hope I make it there in original form and don't otherwise get burned up in some incinerator/dumped into the trash.The fabric is folded in the package and requires a couple of handheld steams to get it flattened out.  I'd buy another one, if I needed one - but not required (an early EOL).  The vendor provided fast/friendly support messages and I encountered no problems with the sale/swap out.  5-stars! Great, good looking vest.

It seemed like a correct fit but if you have a bit of a belly like I do, you're gonna want to UP a size. I'm sending this Large back and ordering an XL. I'm 5'10 200lbs for reference. Sorry no photo. 4 stars for price and look. I'll review again when I get the XL. *UPDATE : The XL came and fits great! I was worried the shoulder area would too much difference but it was just right and, I can button up without feeling too snug. One size up made a huge difference and I'm excited to wear it to my friend's wedding.

评论概述: Choose one size larger than you think.

It releases over time and especially with active movement like choreography.  If you are not doing that then you should be golden. That's my only concern. Other than that it's a solid buy.

评论概述: but don't like tight fitting clothes (i
评论详情: Seems to be a big thing about the pockets...so, ALL THREE pockets can be used, if they are opened.  On the chest pocket, I opened the seam in front of the white fabric the vest comes with (see picture).  On both of the lower pockets, I opened the bottom seam you'll see when you first look at the pocket opening  (When you hold back the flaps of the pocket, you'll see two seams that run along the length of the opening.  I don't know what happens if you open the top seam...).As to size, I usually take a men's medium (USA), but don't like tight fitting clothes (i.e., slim fit),  so I ordered a large, instead.  Adjusting the back belt helps pull it in a little, but was still a little loose, yet.  After I take it in a little at the bottom of each arm hole, it'll probably fit about halfway between medium and large. So I think the size is about right.overall, I like it.

I really like this jacket it was great. The color was nice. It was smooth it fit really well. It tightened it properly. The only bummer it had was the little white handkerchief that comes sewn into the pocket. I didn’t like that. I wish I had a way to take that out.

Vest is ok for the price, but it runs very small. I usually wear a L but bought an XL based on reviews.  It was still snug.  I went to Macy’s and bought another vest at 60% off, which was higher quality and fit better and only $5 more.

I wear a 42 long dress jacket, so I order the medium.  Way to small.  Returned and ordered Large.  Still way to small.  These are for young men who don't have ANY build to them.  Otherwise they are nice looking.  I am 6 ft tall and weigh 185.
Fit perfect I’m five 5,8 195 pounds

Be sure the check the size chart. I ordered both the XL and XXL for my boyfriend just to be on the safe side. He’s an xl in all other clothes but needed to size up to the XXL for this. The quality seemed pretty good although he hasn’t worn it yet. It feels nice and soft. The reason for the 4 stars is that the item came dirty with obvious food spilled on the front. Clearly someone purchased, used for an event and returned the vest. It was not inspected before being restocked. Probably not the sellers fault but more so how amazon handles returns. Just be aware that you might not be getting a “new” vest.

I'm hoping it will last through the summer when it is too hot to wear a jacket at work.

I bought a medium.  The chart says the medium chest size is 43.3".  The tape measure says the medium is 41".  The chart sizes seem to be one size larger than they really are.  So beware of that and buy one size larger.  This apparently is a common problem with Chinese products.  Sizes don't appear to translate well.

I ordered this vest in 3XL based on the sizing chart.  I have worn 3XL for years but have lost nearly 70lbs over the last year so you think I could downsize.  When I tried on the clearly labeled 3XL vest I couldn’t even draw it over my stomach by at least 6”.  I have seen this before where items from Asia are not sized like in the US.  I have no idea about the quality of the vest as I couldn’t even wear it.  I have other 3XL vests that not only fit but are very loose due to my weight loss.  Simply put, don’t trust the sizing, purchase at hour own risk
